tool_description: Now you can get data of all latest anime and episodes.
title: Latest Anime API

api_list.name: Search Anime
api_list.description: The search query; i.e. the title of the item you are looking for.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-anime-api.p.rapidapi.com/anime/gogoanime/{query}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-anime-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: No Ads Media Servers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-anime-api.p.rapidapi.com/anime/gogoanime/watch/{episodeid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-anime-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Anime Info
api_list.description: The GogoAnime ID of the anime; i.e. provided by searching for said anime and selecting the correct one.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-anime-api.p.rapidapi.com/anime/gogoanime/info/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-anime-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
